captions.text: When you become a hotshot politician...
what's the first thing that you'll do?
I'll open up a sports academy in your name.
let's focus on the road ahead...
Ish, Omi and you have been best friends...
‘It's a Sunday, a day to drink away!’
Smells so much better than your money!
It's my money that got us here!
I got this offering for you.
The youth is the future of this country.

title: Kai Po Che | Official Trailer 2013 I Sushant Singh Rajput, Amit Sadh, Raj Kumar Yadav
